Our Chrome extension for Poshmark sellers is a must-have for all poshers who want to carry their hobby to a pro level and make some real ðŸ’µ

You will save a great deal of time as My Closet Pixie automates your interaction process on Poshmark smartly. Get more attention by the adaptive following and sharing process of Closet Pixie Poshmark Bot. And consequently, increase your sales. Focus on other aspects of your business, or spend more time with your friends or family.

ðŸ‘‰ Easy to use
Simple user interface with a familiar layout, and natural colors. All main activities are located under the home-button, divided into three sections: My Closet, Share, and Follow.

ðŸ‘‰ Organize your closet
Arrange your closet easily in the order you want. Just drag and drop your fashion items, and move them around. Make your closet attractive to other poshers.

ðŸ‘‰ Human-like behavior
Designed to make your automated actions look human. The default speed corresponds to the actual human speed, and can be adjusted according to your needs.

ðŸ‘‰ Follow style mates
Follow thousands of style mates with just a single click. Find the pages with users you want to follow and My Closet Pixie will find and follow them.

ðŸ‘‰ Share automatically
Share multiple listings to your followers or to a party with just one click. Automatically reshare listings. Adjust the sharing speed and daily limit according to your level.

ðŸ‘‰ Instant alerts
Closet Pixie notifies you of successful actions and errors. In this way you can react quickly without disturbing you when it is not needed. Make the most of your time with Closet Pixie.

ðŸ‘‰ Make special offers
Create special offers for multiple items at once, and send them to your likers. Just specify a discount, and you can create all offers with just one click.

ðŸ‘‰ Captcha solving
When the captcha check appears, Closet Pixie resolves it, and continues working. Automatic captcha solving is included in the subscription without any extra costs.

ðŸ‘‰ Support and updates
We are here to help you achieve your posher goals. Contact us with any questions, and we are happy to help you. We are always watching the latest posher changes, and are constantly adding new features.
